activity.title: coronasafe/leaderboard#281
activity.text:
It's functioning well on my device.

However, by incorporating a dynamic page for specific project details, such as projects/[id], we can distinctly separate the project page from the projects page. 

This way, in the future, we can modify the projects page according to our needs without affecting the specific project page. 

Integrating a dynamic page for specific project details will definitely reduce the loading time. By focusing on just one project instead of loading all the projects at once, we can optimize the performance significantly.
